Review: From the entrance, my heart couldn't stop saying a word, Beautiful! Beautiful! Beautiful! The baggage dropping and security check-in was hassle free. All the covid norms are being followed properly on airport. The airport looks neat and clean. The airport staff is helpful!

Good clean airport. Indoor plants were a nice touch. Feels fresh and clean. Some pretty good art installations were also there. Can increase the number of such art installations more though. Still, a good combination of modern clean aesthetics with a mix of natural beauties and traditional art. All in all pretty pretty airport. Thumbs up.

I think Bangalore is one of the best airports in India equipped with latest technology such as contact less screening and paperless security check in which makes it technology efficient in true sense. Currently Kempegowda International Airport (KIA)'s other wing is under construction which is being constructed besides the current one. It will take another two-three years to complete I guess. The current airport is already huge but Bangalore airport is very busy I suppose. That might be the reason that they are extending the current airport to accommodate more traffic in the coming years. The surrounding area is also beautifully developed. It has flowers and beautiful trees all around which looks amazing from outside. There are number of shops available for shopping for all age groups. Which makes it very vibrant.

The best Airport I've ever seen/ been to. From the ground staff till u board, everything is smooth and easy. It's got lot of food places & lot of options available too. Very neat and clean. Thus the 5 stars. 🤩

It's the best airport ,of the all I have visited.
The infrastructure and design is top class.
You can get everything here.

This Airport is simply amazing, the departure , the arrivals, the lounges, the eateries area .etc.everything are well planned and spacious. Even if you happen to reach the airport a couple of hours earlier you have plenty of avenues to kill your time both inside the airport as well as outside. I would suggest to reach the airport 3-4 hours earlier just to soak in and experience this.
During this pandemic allmost all are following the Covid rules and regulations, all flight staffs ensure that every passenger is safe.
Kudos KIAL!!!!

The airport is quite and nice ambiance. Their housekeeping is satisfactory. Also there is a dedicated meditation facility provided at departure.

Cool and chil out place..spacious to roam around and have fun. Clean and tidy..

Neat and clean... Wonderful and perfect maintenance.... Even I didn't see this much neatness in anyother international airport.... Keep it up

The best of all airports...honestly. very systematic..helpful staff, clean surroundings. Most of all, 99% of people who come here- be it passengers or staff of the Airport, behave responsibly. It will always be a seamless experience 😀👍 Have a safe and assured trip.

The only CON that I felt- the prices of the food items are sky-rocketing. But the food is really good.

It is one of the best airport in India, it has all facilities and updated services. Location wise little negative because it is very far from Bangalore city. It is situated at very outskirts of Bangalore named Devanahalli. Commuting is no problems. All types of possible way, either bus, cab, personal vehicle are available. Roads approach towards airport are very good and dedicated flyovers are constructed to reduce the commuting time. Overall good feel and experience.

This airport is just awesome, beautiful, great. One cannot take their eyes from the beautiful view, discipline and how the airport staff manages everything. From security check at entrance to baggage drop to security till the gates to enter your airplane. Shops and other food services are also very great.

The only problem is that it is very far from the main city. Otherwise it is a very large and beautiful airport which is very well maintained. The seating arrangements are proper to accommodate everyone and the shopping options are plenty. Lounge and other facilities are good. And the people there are very helpful.

The airport is very clean and the security staff don't touch your phone or boarding pass or ID cards unlike some airports.

The cleaning staff are very proactive. Keep up the good job.

During these COVID times.
The lounge is the best place as they follow the best protocols. From cleaning to serving food or coffee.

Overall a good job by the team.

"Kempegowda International Airport" is 37 k.m. away from ciry center. Airport is very neet and clean. Parking spaces are ample and good. Suitable transportation facilities are available. Good place ...good atmosphere.
Beautiful place! Well maintained, even during the pandemic. Taking up necessary precautions and making sure about a hassle free experience. Staff members are really helpful.

The Bangalore airport has turned into a beautiful place to hang up at times even if u are not travelling anywhere. Just take your bike and start the ride. I with my family do that .and enjoy the long ride till airport. Post which we try some foods in the restaurants outside the airport area. Love to go on a long ride to Airport .

Very bigg airport. It's neat, it's clean and one of the best international airports in India. The staff is polite and helpful. They offer remote assistance through video calls at kiosks which are conveniently located at regular information (Maybe because of Covid pandemic). The lounge is good too. Many options for shopping for gentlemen, ladies and kids.

One of the best international airports in the world. World class facilities with tight security. Unbelievably humble and polite flight attendants. Thanks Indigo for wonderful experience. Kudos to Airport authorities for taking care of people during this difficult condition of Covid19.
Truely International Airport. Multiple outlets offering almost everything. A couple of hours can be spent here. The staff is too good.
Beautiful place! Well maintained, even during the pandemic. Taking up necessary precautions and making sure about a hassle free experience. Staff members are really helpful.

Very well managed, proper sanitized and all the process from collecting boarding pass to bag tag is touch free, so contamination chances are minimal. Lounge is pretty good and feels the quality of food needs to be improved. There are many other food joints inside airport which are well managed and serve good quality food. All in al good experience
Excellent airport! the security service was better than others even in Covid-19

The cleanest and most inviting airport I've ever been too, some staff are really friendly, some have been doing the job for too long that they've stopped putting in that extra effort to add to the pizzazz of the place. Food places are expensive, as are in airports everywhere. Toilets are clean, water provided, and especially during covid, I've seen such a drastic change in behaviour, and management.
Very neat and clean airport of Bangalore. Though it's too far from city but it's good.

Kempegowda International Airport is one of the busiest airport in South Indian. It connects to almost all part of India as well as abroad. A new terminal is under construction as of now, once build it will ease passenger load. Top notch facility. Get long queues during rush hours, so plan according. Contact less travel during these covid times

One of the most beautiful Airports in India 🇮🇳
This is located in banglore very far from city.
Even if you come early you can pass time in this airport. As its always entertaining.
I travel many times from this airport.
I love this place ❤ 💕
Specally in Christmas 🎄 its wow 👏 😍

The beautiful Bengaluru airport outside Bengaluru!
Excellent infra! Quality service. Huge spaces. Great food courts.
Blr airport is world class. Apart from the security gate, everything works smooth. Lounge, shops, brewery all amazing.

Wow. i love this airport but this airport is too much far from city Bangalore man like it is in long distance relationship with Bangalore. lol. Everything was so hygiene i love employees there all of them was so kind and so humble. I loved my ride and truly saying it deserves 5star.

I would say Bangalore airport is one of the bestest and finest airport in India. The only cons is it is outside of city and you have to spend few pennies to reach there but overall it was a great experience. One must spend at least 2-3 hours if you are visiting for the first time. Have been to the lounge and adding a photo of my breakfast. They have maintained the airport very well even in the covid pandemic.

The best airport in South India. Great amenities, good lounges, baby care rooms and all other facilities. Only problem it is too congested due to the number of travellers. Hoping to see the T2 opened soon, which might be more spacious.

Very nice and big airport one of the major and prominent airport of India. You'll get almost all countries flights from here ranging from small countries like Malaysia,japan to big countries like us and china. Many other facilities like food, cabs,buses to cities are easily available from here even buses for mysuru is also available from here.
The airport is busy most of the time and India's 3rd busiest airport. The airport is expanding and new terminal is building and will be in operation soon. Overall experience was awesome.
The airport is well maintained in general. More care has been taken by the airport authority to ensure the safety of all passengers especially when I travelled during covid-19.

Never seen such a clean and biggest Airport in India.
Very well maintained.

The air port is located too far from the city around 50  kms away and hence it takes an Uber /Ola /Taxi ride of Rs 1200 to 1500 to reach the airport.

The airport is vast and is also a silent airport which means not a lot of announcements are done here.

The airport lounge(check for free buffet in your credit card offers) , restaurant facilities are good inside(though its expensive) and also one can find good places to eat just in front of the airport entrance .

What i loved is the security check in.It has automated tray system and swift security check in.
Also a passenger will find it very easy to go through to his or her gate.

Being a very busy airport and a majestic airport, one seriously needs to follow check in time procedures otherwise you risk the chance of missing your flight.

The aircraft takes around 10 to 15 minutes from the gate to final take off.
Also it takes 10 to 15 mins after landing to reach the arrival gate.

The air port is also undergoing some more construction activity for expansion i suppose

Its one of India's finest Airport.
Only demerit, it's very far from city & through many traffic packed zones so one needs enough buffer time in hand to reach Airport.

Super good place, During COVID I see the empty :( Airport, hope all gets better soon!
Domestic and International connections are super convenient here! Shops are good!
I really loved their method of using solar energy.  Nice initiative.
Excellent airport. Friendly staff and quick process. In times of covid also they did a great job. Keep up the good work.

Enjoyed my time in Bangalore airport. Very neatly maintained with all safety protocols. Must recommended is the brewery WINDMILLS outside near the Giant screen. This was one of a kind experience.. Very friendly staffs and nice ambience with live match playing on the screen. 😊

Such a Developed And  ever improved Growing Place. Connectivity to other parts of City also mind blowing and Convinient too. Easily can get city buses and cabs to reach inside city from Airport. The staying facility like hotel also …
I love this airport. Really fast processes and kind staff. Only thing I can think of is maybe having more stores with affordable prices for food.
Very clean and scenic view in the devloping stage. Looks great after completion

One of the best & busiest airport in India. Well infrastructure. All facilities are there. Eateries & cuisines has more options. Staff is supportive. Lot of time wasting while standing in que for hand bag checking & scanning. Pleasant ambience. Toilets & floors are clean.

The upgrade is looking quite good. With high tech stuff employed from entrance to terminal till boarding the plane, it's a breeze moving through this airport. It's turning out to be quite an international Airport.

Very well maintained lounges. Lots to eat and shop. Self checking kiosks available. Immigration counters can sometimes be time consuming because of long queues. One of the fastest growing airports in India. Connectivity getting better everyday. Overall a great airport.

Well maintained, clean and tidy... Airport has multiple kiosks for generating boarding pass and baggage tags, this makes boarding procedures easy.. Though airport is crowded, the management is doing a good work to maintain flow of …
Cleanest airport I have seen in India so far. lounge is nice. Good food options. Nicely planned airport.
Very nice airport. You have proper couches and places to sit and work on your laptop. Its a big airport. I liked the place
